title: Mikhail Filippov
text:
Mikhail Mikhailovich Filippov (; born 10 June 1992) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He plays as a <a href="Goalkeeper%20%28association%20football%29">goalkeeper</a> for <a href="FC%20Shinnik%20Yaroslavl">FC Shinnik Yaroslavl</a>.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Premier%20League">Russian Premier League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Yenisey%20Krasnoyarsk">FC Yenisey Krasnoyarsk</a> on 7 October 2018 in a game against <a href="FC%20Spartak%20Moscow">FC Spartak Moscow</a>.
On 19 February 2019, he joined <a href="FC%20Rotor%20Volgograd">FC Rotor Volgograd</a> on loan until the end of the 2018–19 season.
